analysis.description:

Parameter '_owner' of JustDCoin.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/31/0x4f083c2f2d8f9b6702fe89117961f34d12ae1787.sol#50-51) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of JustDCoin.dividends (/unique_chucks/31/0x4f083c2f2d8f9b6702fe89117961f34d12ae1787.sol#200) is not in mixedCase
